title: Garbage RIOT too OP.
body:
So... I say nothing worth being restricted for, at all. I don't even call garbage kids "garbage" any more. Yet, STILL, getting restrictions.

I just worked my chat restrictions off, and three games later got down to 2 Ranked restrictions remaining. I go to watch a show, then I come back and hop in a game and suddenly poof... chat/ranked restrictions again, with no e-mail even explaining why.

This community, and RIOT, are such trash. 

At this point, I would honestly just let a RIOT tribunal employee die if they were dying right in front of me. I'd be like, "Sorry, can't help, I'm restricted".

replies.body: I am sorry but the way you are talking shows you have learned nothing at all.
You would let a person die right in front of you because you are chat restricted by riot? When that riot employee had nothing to do with it? Seek help if possible
